loyaltyDesc1: You’re almost there! You can setup multiple discounted bundles to increase
loyaltyDesc2: Your customer retention and reward your customers for their loyalty.
storeDesc1: Your store is where your customers will be able to see your drinks and loyalty schemes.
storeDesc2: If you’ve got multiple branches you can setup multiple stores.
bankTitle: Setup Bank Details for your Store
bankDesc: This will allow customers to pay in to your account directly. We use Stripe as our Payment gateway so you can be assured that your money will always be safe and Secure. Your store cannot go ‘live’ without setting up bank details.
drinksDesc: You should setup your extras first this way you can link them to your drinks Whilst setting the drinks up. You can connect a drink to multiple stores if you Have multiple stores setup.
itemStore: Create a Store &. Setup Bank Details
needHelpDesc: Get in touch with the us via contact@waycupapp.com and with any issues or suggestions and we’ll get back to you pronto!
sellBundlesTitle: It’s time to sell your bundles
sellBundlesDesc: Encourage and guide your customers to download the Waycup app on their phone and purchase a bundle from your store.  Let’s start with a target of selling 10 bundles.
offlineDesc: You can set a store to online by going to stores, selecting your store and switching the toggle to ‘online’.
onlineDesc: Remember to tell all of your customers. The more your customers purchase your bundles, the more you increase your customer retention.
